text: The following is a timeline of the history of the city of Novosibirsk, Russia. ==Prior to 20th century== * 1893 – Novonikolayevsk settlement developed on former village site during building of Trans Siberian Railway. * 1895 – Resettlement Center was established. * 1897 – Bridge built over Ob River. * 1899 – Alexander Nevsky Cathedral built. * 1900 – Typography of N. P. Litvinov opens.115 лет назад открылась первая типография в поселке Новониколаевский (1900). Центральная городская детская библиотека имени Аркадия Гайдара. ==20th century== * 1904 ** Novonikolayevsk became town. ** Infectious Diseases Hospital edtablished. * 1906 – First bank opens. * 1909 – Novonikolayevsk Fire. * 1913 ** Population: 62,967. ** Construction of the Military Town was completed. * 1915 – Chapel of St. Nicholas built. * 1916 – Sugar Riot * 1917 – December: Soviets in power. * 1921 – City becomes seat of the . * 1922 – Monument to the Heroes of the Revolution unveiled. * 1925 ** established. ** Lenin Building constructed on Krasny Prospekt. ** City becomes capital of the . * 1926 ** City renamed "Novosibirsk." ** Population: 120,128. ** founded. ** Sibkraisoyuz, Sibrevcom and Textilsindikat buildings were constructed. ** June 21 – A major fire in the center of Novosibirsk. ** November 7 – Sibrevcomovsky Bridge was opened. * 1927 ** Spartak Stadium opens. ** Statue of Lenin unveiled on Barnaul Street. ** July – Construction of a water transportation and sewage system began in the city * 1929 – Sibselmash established. * 1930 ** City becomes capital of the . ** Zaobsky District was formed. * 1931 – Komsomolsky Railway Bridge built. * 1932 ** National Bank building constructed. ** Siberian State Transport University opens. * 1933 ** Dzerzhinsky District was established. ** founded. * 1934 – Novosibirsk tram begins operating. * 1935 – Marketplace area officially named * 1936 – Football Club Sibir Novosibirsk formed. * 1937 ** City becomes part of Novosibirsk Oblast. ** founded. * 1939 ** established. ** Population: 405,589. * 1940 – Zayeltsovsky District was formed. * 1941 ** Chaplygin Siberian Scientific Research Institute Of Aviation founded. ** Elektrosignal Plant established. ** NIIIP evacuated to Novosibirsk. * 1942 – Novosibirsk Thermal Power Plant 3 started operating. * 1943 ** Novosibirsk TB Research Institute established. ** Institute of Systematics and Ecology of Animals founded. ** opens. * 1944 – Siberian Scientific Research Institute of Metrology established. * 1945 – Novosibirsk Opera and Ballet Theatre building opens. * 1946 ** Central Siberian Botanic Garden established. ** Novosibirsk Research Institute of Traumatology and Orthopedics was created. * 1947 – Novosibirsk Zoo founded. * 1950 – Novosibirsk State Technical University established. * 1952 ** opens in Central Park. ** Kleschihinskoe cemetery established. * 1953 – NPO ELSIB founded. * 1955 – Kommunalny Bridge built. * 1956 ** Novosibirsk Conservatory established. ** Novosibirsk State Choreographic School was created. * 1957 ** Palace of Culture named after M. Gorky and House of Culture named after A. Popov were built.ДК им. А.С. Попова. Novosibdom.ru.Дворец культуры им. А. М. Горького. Novosibdom.ru. ** Vecherniy Novosibirsk established. ** begins operating. ** Siberian Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences established. ** Novosibirsk Reservoir created near city. * 1958 ** Sovetsky District was formed. ** Institute of Economics and Organization of Industrial Production established. ** founded. * 1959 ** Novosibirsk Capacitor Plant was commissioned. ** Budker Institute of Nuclear Physics was founded. ** Novosibirsk State University established. ** established in Central Park. ** Population: 885,045. ** Development of science town Akademgorodok begins near city. ** Fox domestication experiment. * 1960 – Novosibirsk State Theater Institute founded. * 1962 ** Algebra i Logika founded. ** HC Sibir Novosibirsk founded. * 1964 ** Ice Sports Palace Sibir opens. ** established. ** established * 1965 – Population: 1,029,000. * 1966 ** Siberian Mathematical Journal established. ** founded. ** formed. * 1967 ** Novosibirsk Military Command Academy established. ** established. * 1968 – Institute of Soil Science and Agrochemistry founded. * 1970 – unveiled in Lenin Square, Novosibirsk. * 1977 – Novosibirsk Thermal Power Plant 5 started operating. * 1978 – Dimitrovsky Bridge built. * 1980 – Part of the Dzerzhinsky District became the Kalininsky DistrictThe Novosibirsk government. Official site.. * 1981 – Siberian State University of Telecommunications and Informatics active. * 1982 – ND experiment. * 1984 – Novosibirsk Globus Theatre built. * 1985 – Population: 1,393,000. * 1986 ** Novosibirsk Metro begins operating. ** Metro Bridge opens. ** Institute of Informatics and Computer Science established. * 1987 ** Ploshchad Garina-Mikhaylovskogo Metro Station opens. ** Sibirskaya Metro Station built. * 1988 – SoftLab-NSK established. * 1989 – Siberian Serpentarium established. * 1990 ** founded. ** established. * 1991 ** Center of Financial Technologies established. ** Ploshchad Marksa Metro Station built. ** Siberian Stock Exchange established. ** Novosibirsk State Agrarian University active. ** established. ** becomes governor of Novosibirsk Oblast. * 1992 ** Novosibirsk State Technical University active. ** Biathlon World Championships 1992 ** Gagarinskaya Metro Station opens. ** Zayeltsovskaya Metro Station built. * 1995 – SND Experiment. * 1996 – founded. * 1997 – Transfiguration Cathedral built. * 1998 – Sibers established. * 1999 ** Alawar established. ** 2GIS founded. ** Viktor Tolokonsky becomes governor of Novosibirsk Oblast. * 2000 ** Sib-Altera theatre festival begins. ** Vladimir Gorodetsky becomes mayor. ** City becomes part of the Siberian Federal District. ** Museum for Railway Technology Novosibirsk established. ** Marshala Pokryshkina Metro Station opens. ==21st century== * 2001 – The murder of the vice mayor of Novosibirsk Igor Belyakov.Вице-мэра Новосибирска убили за приверженность рынку. Известия. March 2, 2004. * 2002 – Roman Catholic Diocese of Transfiguration at Novosibirsk active. * 2003 – Novosibirsk Crematorium was opened. * 2004 – The murder of the vice mayor of Novosibirsk Valery Mariasov.Контрольный выстрел в городскую голову. Российская газета March 3, 2004. * 2005 ** Beryozovaya Roshcha Metro Station built. ** Small West Siberian Railway opens. * 2007 – founded. * 2008 – Novosibirsk was in the center of the path of a solar eclipse. * 2009 – Goethe-Institut opens in Novosibirsk. * 2010 ** Population: 1,473,754. ** Zolotaya Niva Metro Station opens. * 2011 – Aura Mall was opened. * 2012 – Opening of the second planetarium of the city.Novosibirsk Planetarium. Novosibdom.ru. * 2014 ** Bugrinsky Bridge opens. ** Anatoly Lokot becomes mayor. * 2016 ** Novosibirsk Dolphinarium opens.Dolphinarium and pavilion for pinguins opened in Novosibirsk Zoo. Getty Images. ** Akvamir Waterpark built.Coming to a Shopping Center Near You … A Waterpark? Aquatics International. ** Chistaya Sloboda Mikrodistrict and Marx Square were connected by a tram line.Поезд на Слободу. НГС.НОВОСТИ. November 10, 2016. * 2018 ** Population: 1,612,833. ** The reconstruction of the Mikhailovskaya Embankment was completed.In Novosibirsk, after the reconstruction, the famous Mikhailovskaya Embankment was opened. Channel One. В Новосибирске после реконструкции открылась знаменитая Михайловская набережная. Первый канал.
